KH Summon
W XW 1 Instant Instant
3 Search your library for a nonlegendary creature with converted mana cost X or less, then put it on battlefield tapped.
KH Gravity
B B 1 Instant Instant
3 Halve constitution to target opponent creature. Overload 1BB (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Magnete
2 2 Instant Instant
3 Kicker {2}. (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Target creature you control gains splash damage 1/3. If Magnete was kicked, it gains splash damage 2 instead.
KH Reflect
3 3 Instant Instant
3 Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Overload 7 (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Stop
U 1U 2 Instant Instant
3 Kicker {2}. Exile target creature and put a time counter on it. If it doesn’t have suspend, it gains suspend. If Stop was kicked, put two time counters instead. (At the beginning of its owner’s upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they play it without paying its mana cost. If it’s a creature, it has haste.)
KH Cure
G G 1 Instant Instant
3 Regenerate target creature you control. (The next time that permanent would be destroyed this turn, it isn’t. Instead tap it.) Overload 1GGG (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Thunder
WR R/W 1 Instant Instant
3 Thunder deals 3 damage to target opponent. Overload 1R/WR/W (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Aero
1 1 Instant Instant
3 Target creature you control gains +0/+2 until end of turn. Overload {3} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Blizzard
U U 1 Instant Instant
3 Blizzard deals 1 damage to target creature opponent controls, then tap it. Overload 1UUU (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Fire
R R 1 Instant Instant
3 Fire deals 2 damage to any target. Overload 1RR (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Confuse
WU WU 2 Instant Instant
3 When target creature opponent controls attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you call it right, that creature can’t attack or block, then tap it. Overload WWUU (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Sleep
B BB 2 Instant Instant
3 Target creature opponent controls doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. Overload 2BBB (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Poison
UB H/UB 2 Instant Instant
3 Target creature you control gains infect. (That creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Overload H/UH/UBB (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Water

3 Abilities of target creature opponent controls cost {1} in addition to their activation cost. Overload 1UUU (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)
KH Slow
UG GU 2 Instant Instant
3 Target creature opponent controls gains last strike. (That creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.) Overload GGUU (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)

3 Target creature you control loses all counters and gains hexproof until end of current phase. Overload WWUU (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)

3 Return target creature opponent controls to its owner’s hand. Overload 4WWW (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)

KH Zettaflare

3 Exile target creature ignoring hexproof. Then exile Zettaflare.
KH Protect
2 2 Instant Instant
3 Target creature you control has ward {2}. (Whenever that permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Overload {6} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of “target” with “each”.)

KH Darkness within Darkness
